title: Record
description: A record in the Materials Data Facility

globus_endpoint.description: The ID of the Globus Endpoint hosting the file

http_host.description: The fully-qualified HTTP hostname, including protocol, but without the path (for example, 'https://data.materialsdatafacility.org')

path.description: The full path to the data file on the host

mdf-acl.description: The UUIDs allowed to view this metadata, or 'public'

mdf-collection.description: The collection for the record, if different from the dataset

mdf-data_format.description: The file format(s) of the data (for example, 'vasp'), if different from the dataset

mdf-data_type.description: The broad categorization of the data (for example, DFT), if different from the dataset

mdf-citation.description: The full bibliographic citation(s) for the record, if different from the dataset

mdf-license.description: A link to the license for distribution of the record, if different from the dataset

mdf-author.description: A list of the authors of this record, if different from the dataset

mdf-data_contact.description: The contact person/steward/custodian for the record, if different from the dataset

mdf-tags.description: Tags, keywords, or other specific descriptors for the record not in the dataset tags

mdf-year.description: The year of record creation, if different from the dataset

mdf-ingest-date.description: The date this entry was created

mdf-metadata_version.description: The metadata schema version this entry adheres to

mdf-landing_page.description: The human-friendly landing page for the record

mdf-publication.description: The DOI(s) (in link form, ex. 'https://dx.doi.org/10.12345') for publications connected to the record, if different from the dataset

mdf-dataset_doi.description: The DOI of the record itself (in link form), if separate from the dataset

mdf-parent_id.description: The mdf-id of this record's dataset

mdf-id.description: A unique BSON ID for this entry

mdf-composition.description: Material composition studies, expressed in a chemical formula (ex. Bi2S3)

mdf-element.description: The element(s) in the material composition

mdf-raw.description: A string containing the record as JSON

mdf-mrr.description: Fields relating the the NIST Materials Resource Registry system
